question: Who among the following was the first woman to serve the post of Director General of Police (DGP)?
explanation: Kanchan Chaudhary Bhattacharya was the first woman to serve the post of Director General of Police (DGP). She was also the second woman officer to join the Indian Police Service after Kiran Bedi. She was a 1973 batch IPS officer. Recently she passed away in Mumbai.
